Register yourself at: https://tinyurl.com/teamkart18 to appear for our selection test on Monday.

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared their post.
message: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared their post. The new differential mounts and hubs are machined and ready for testing ! We would like to thank our Machining sponsor, D.S. Machinery for their support in our endeavor. Shoutout to the capable proffesionals at the workshop who understood our passion for SAE. They can be contacted on the following number:- +91- 9891910036 #K4Build #sponsorsupport #sponsorupdate #fsae #formulastudent

To build a quality car, you need quality products and services. And aiding us in acquiring these are our sponsors, helping us materialize our goals! So starting from today, we will be dedicating a post each weekend to thank each of our sponsors.

So, here goes the first post on Sponsors' Sundays. We would like to thank Earthx Batteries for providing us with their safe and high performance lithium ion battery and enabling us to charge our ride! 

#SponsorsSunday
#earthxbatteries
#chargeyourride
#formulastudent
#racecarbuild

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur added 6 new photos.
message:
The 'Introduction to Automotive Engineering' workshop was organized by TeamKART in association with Team XLR8 of Jadavpur university last month, which was graced by the presence of the chief guest, Mr. Prashanth Tharani. The workshop witnessed a participation of more than 600 enthusiastic students.
We thank our event sponsor, OYO Rooms, for helping make the event successful.

#fsae
#teamkart
#xlr8
#formulastudent

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared Team XLR8's post.
message: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared Team XLR8's post. Knock Knock! The red letter day of automobile enthusiasts of Kolkata and Jadavpur University is coming closer. So get ready to experience the bang presented by us with the collaboration with Team Kart. We are overwhelmed with the presence of our honourable chief Chief Guest Mr. Prasanth Tharani. In case you have missed to register still do it as soon as possible as the event is incomplete without your presence. Link of Registration: given in the comment section Please follow the schedule of the event given below for your convenience [**All participants will receive certificates. **Technical presentations and software training will be imparted by Team KART technical team heads. **Prashanth Tharani, a well-known professional touring car racer is the Chief Guest.] So 23 hours more to wait and then see you guys over there on time :D Registration link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeVg3CqdD2B6DeOu00uWkIhzOizhp4yCTHAHr8wEjzGHg8PaQ/viewform

Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared Team Excellerate's event.
Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared Team Excellerate's event.

message:
We are glad to announce that Mr. Prashanth Tharani will be gracing our workshop with his presence. 
Winner of Polo R Cup race in China, 2016, this man needs no introduction. Mr. Tharani has also competed for Zest Race Car Engineering, and drove Seat Eurocup car for them in the Creventic Endurance races in Barcelona and Czech Republic in 2016.

If you still haven't registered for the workshop, make sure you do now ! Don't miss the chance. Register yourself at : - 
https://tinyurl.com/TeamKART-workshop

Make sure to witness the racing prowess of this driver as he talks about his experience and his current automotive indulgences, in the Workshop on Automotive Engineering, on Friday the 23rd.

#jadavpur
#teamkart
#xlr8
#sae
#formulastudent
#workshop

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared Team Excellerate's video.
message: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur shared Team Excellerate's video. Hola amigos. Here comes the teaser for our event on 23rd March, 2018. It's going to be bigger and more fun than the previous ones. So mark your calendar and get ready. Till then, keep following our page. Registration to begin soon. Adios.

It's one thing to admire cars ,
It's an entirely different thing to build a race-car on your own. 

To all the petrol-heads, the grease lovers, we give you a chance to indulge yourselves in the art of building race-cars. 
Team KART along with Team XLR8 of Jadavpur University, welcomes you the workshop of Automotive Engineering.
Stay tuned for more updates ! 

#jadavpur
#teamkart
#xlr8
#sae
#formulastudent
#workshop

It's one thing to admire cars ,
It's an entirely different thing to build a race-car on your own. 

To all the petrol-heads, the grease lovers, we give you a chance to indulge yourselves in the art of building race-cars. 
Team KART along with Team XLR8 of Jadavpur University, welcomes you the workshop of Automotive Engineering.
Stay tuned for more updates ! 

#jadavpur
#teamkart
#xlr8
#sae
#formulastudent
#workshop

It's one thing to admire cars ,
It's an entirely different thing to build a race-car on your own.

To all the petrol heads, the grease lovers who fantasized race-cars and built them out of LEGO in their childhood, get ready to indulge yourselves in the workshop on automotive engineering organized along-with Team XLR8 of Jadavpur University. 
Lots to look forward to and lots to learn. 
Stay tuned for more updates ! 
Cheers !

#sae
#formulastudent
#workshop
#XLR8
#jadavpur
#teamkart

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur added 3 new photos.
message:
"Seeing such technological improvements in the institute brings joy to me, fills me with pride and makes me nostalgic to the times when we were this wild and innovative !"- that was what the Alumni Meet was all about. 
We are thankful to the batch of '68, '78 and '93 for visiting us at the Bay and the arena. Your crucial support continues to motivate us to reach new heights in the automotive world !  

#15AAM
#FSAE
#FormulaStudent
#AlumniMeet
#BuildARacecar

Ah ! Christmas, its is finally here ! 
The feeling that gives us the opportunity to pause and reflect on the important things around us! 

And while we think of Santa to come  bearing gifts on sleds, we present you Team KART's rendition of his vehicle of choice - something to suit the modern era, something faster than those galloping reindeers, something that hints at the bleeding edge of the modern automotive engineering- a Formula SAE car perhaps ! 

Merry Christmas everyone and hope you have a lovely day ! 
Cheers !

#sae #formulasae
#christmasfever #xmas #holidayseason
#formulastudent
#wearekart

message:
A design isn't ready until someone has given excruciating hours in thinking through it,analyzing it and sorted out its errors. 
A design isn't finished until its built and ready for use. 
We can now gladly say that our intake is finished. 

We would like to thank  AutoAbode for their precision 3D builds !  
 
#fsae 
#sae
#becauseracecar
#racebuild
#racecarbuilds
#formulastudent
#wearekart

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur added 2 new photos.
message:
Constant healthy discussions with various field experts is what gives our team a competitive edge over others. Some of the team members got the chance to interact with Professor Larry Cox of Pepperdine University ( USA ) during the workshop on Innovation and Product Engineering. We would like to thank Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur for giving us this opportunity.
#brilliant_ideas
#becauseracecar
#formulastudent

story: Team KART-Formula SAE team of IIT-Kharagpur added 2 new photos.
message:
Engineers are not superhuman. They make mistakes in their assumptions, in their calculations, in their conclusions. That they make mistakes is forgivable; that they catch them is imperative. Thus it is the essence of modern engineering not only to be able to check one's work but also to have one's work checked and to be able to check the work of others.
~Henry Petroski
#sanitychecks #becauseracecar #modernengineering
